ComicInfo.Summary:
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
A cynical look at justice, commitment, relationships, vacations, priorities, annoyances, finance, lawyers, dentists, therapy, guilt, the office, logic, and doctors.
A parody of what really should be written on CD warning labels.

ComicInfo.Title: What Goes Down Must Come Up; Eh!; Only in Hollywood…; New Sales Pitches for Old Technology; A Mad Look at Monsters, Inc.; Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; The Lighter Side of...; For Whom the Booth Tolls; Monroe and… the Youth Job Expo; When Other Teen Idols Jump on the Young Adult Novel Bandwagon; A Toll of Two Cities; Even Yet Still Further More Badly Needed Warning Labels for Today’s Hottest CDs; Some Less-Than-Subtle Indications That Your Fairy Tale Romance Isn’t Going to Have a Happy Ending; America’s Most Wanton
